title: From Quake-Safe Bullet Trains To AI And Security: PM Modi's Big Japan Agenda

content: A Class 5 girl allegedly set herself afire inside the toilet in a government school in the Chitkohra area of Patna on Wednesday.

content: A 17-year-old girl died on Monday after a high fever and seizures in Telangana's Sircilla. Her father thought it was a natural death until he discovered a three-page letter written by the teen a few months ago.

title: Stranded Russian Climber, 47, Presumed Dead: Officials
content: The Russian climber who became stranded on the country's highest peak after breaking her leg more than two weeks ago had found no signs of life.

title: Any Meeting Between Putin, Zelensky Must Be "Well-Prepared": Kremlin
content: "Any high-level or top-level contact must be well-prepared to be effective", Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said.

title: Kerala High Court Grants Anticipatory Bail To Rapper Vedan In Rape Case
content: The Kerala High Court on Wednesday granted anticipatory bail to rapper Hirandas Murali, known as Vedan, in a rape case, saying that while the charges against him were serious, his custodial interrogation was not necessary.

title: They Were Promised Jobs In Serbia, Then Lost Rs 70 Lakh: A Mega Visa Fraud
content: A visa fraud racket that allegedly cheated over a dozen Nepali citizens of lakhs of rupees by luring them with overseas jobs has been busted in Delhi.

title: 3 Class 10 Students Were On A Bike Making Reels. They Crashed, 2 Died
content: Three Class 10 students were on a bike in Bihar, shooting a reel when their vehicle collided with a stationary bus, instantly killing two people, while the third person is in a critical condition.

title: Viral Video Shows Cat Sleeping Peacefully On Lord Ganesh Idol's Arms
content: A sleepy cat curled up in the arms of a Lord Ganesh idol at a pandal set on the occasion of Ganesh Chaturthi.

title: Op Sindoor: Rahul claims PM 'halted' strikes 5 hrs after Trump's threat; BJP hits back
content: Rahul Gandhi criticized PM Modi, citing Trump's claim that Modi halted military action against Pakistan within five hours of a 24-hour ultimatum. However, these claims appear dubious, as the US imposed tariffs on India despite the pause in Operation Sindoor. Modi refuted Trump's statements, asserting that no world leader requested the suspension of the operation.

title: 'At end of day ...': US official's big hint as 50% tariffs hit India
content: Despite escalating trade tensions, a top US official expressed optimism about the future of US-India relations. US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent highlighted the strong bond between President Trump and Prime Minister Modi. While dismissing the possibility of the rupee becoming a global reserve currency, India has initiated export promotion programs in 40 key markets.

title: Nikki death case: Victim's sis-in-law makes dowry claim; grieving father replies
content: Following Nikki Bhati's death from alleged immolation, conflicting claims emerge. Nikki's sister-in-law defends the husband and in-laws, accusing Nikki's family of dowry demands and abuse. Nikki's father vehemently denies these counter-allegations. Investigators are revisiting the case, re-examining Nikki's sister's statement to clarify the events leading to her death.

title: India counters US tariffs: Centre plans 40-nation outreach; textile exports in focus
content: In response to US tariffs, India is targeting 40 key markets, including the UK and Japan, to boost textile exports. This diversification strategy aims to position India as a reliable supplier of sustainable textiles. Export Promotion Councils will lead the effort, leveraging FTAs and international trade fairs.

title: Inter-faith land transfers in Assam to be probed, says CM Himanta
content: The Assam government will now scrutinise land transfers between people of different faiths, focusing on legality, funding sources, social impact, and national security. This SOP will also apply to NGOs buying land for educational or healthcare institutions. Prime Minister Modi is scheduled to visit Assam on September 8 to inaugurate a bio-refinery and lay foundation stones for infrastructure projects.

title: 'What the hell': Donald Trump to Mark Zuckerberg on Meta's $50 billion Data Center
content: During a cabinet meeting, US President Donald Trump announced Meta's plan to invest $50 billion in a new AI data center, potentially the world's largest. While Meta hasn't confirmed the exact figure, the facility will support ambitious AI initiatives, including the Superintelligence Labs division.

title: Trump just welcomed 600K Chinese students and MAGA can't keep calm
content: While Trump’s constant delays has earned him the sobriquet TACO (Trump always chickens out), his latest move has made things even more difficult for the MAGA faithful to swallow: greenlighting the entry of 600,000 Chinese students.

title: How can India offset impact of Trump's tariffs? 'Two broad options' explained
content: Faced with 50% tariffs imposed by the US, India can mitigate the impact by boosting domestic consumption, as its internal market absorbs a significant portion of production, says GTRI. Diversifying export destinations through Free Trade Agreements with the EU, UK, and other nations is another viable strategy.

title: India issues fresh flood alerts to Pak; warns of 'high probability' risk
content: India has issued flood risk alerts to Pakistan for the Tawi river due to heavy rainfall and dam water release, sources told PTI. Shared on humanitarian grounds amidst tense relations, the alerts warn of potential flooding. Pakistan's Punjab province has evacuated over 1.5 lakh people due to rising water levels from India.

title: AI researcher quits Meta: Reveals reason for exit; says he followed Zuckerberg’s advice
content: Meta's Superintelligence Lab is experiencing departures, including AI scientist Rishabh Agarwal, who left after five months despite a reported million-dollar salary, citing a desire for "a different kind of risk." Agarwal's exit follows those of other researchers, some of whom have returned to OpenAI, raising questions about Meta's ambitious superintelligence program and its ability to retain top AI talent.

title: 'We can't forget Pahalgam': Sehwag promotes India vs Pak Asia Cup clash, faces backlash
content: The Asia Cup 2025 is embroiled in controversy after Sony Sports Network's promotional video, highlighting the India-Pakistan rivalry, sparked outrage due to heightened tensions following a terror attack. Fans are calling for boycotts, overshadowing India's first major tournament without Kohli and Sharma. Suryakumar Yadav leads a youthful squad in Group A, facing UAE, Oman, and Pakistan.

title: Gaza City to be evacuated? What Israel said
content: An Israeli military spokesperson announced the "inevitable" evacuation of Gaza City amidst intensified operations against Hamas. The UN has warned of a potential famine due to this evacuation plan. Meanwhile, US President Trump plans to discuss post-war Gaza strategies.

title: Thackeray tie-up? Uddhav meets Raj on Ganesh Chaturthi; civic polls in focus
content: Uddhav Thackeray visited cousin Raj Thackeray's residence for Ganesh Chaturthi in Mumbai, fueling speculation of a potential alliance for upcoming civic polls. This marks their third public interaction, following Raj's birthday visit to Uddhav in July. Their renewed bonhomie was also evident during a joint political appearance protesting language policies.

title: 'ChatGPT responsible for our son's suicide': Parents of 16-year-old sue OpenAI, Sam Altman
content: The parents of Adam Raine, a 16-year-old boy, are suing OpenAI and CEO Sam Altman, alleging that ChatGPT provided their son with instructions and encouragement related to suicide. The lawsuit claims the chatbot validated Adam's suicidal thoughts, offered specific details on lethal methods, and guided him on obtaining alcohol.

title: Flood fury grips Punjab: 400 students trapped in school; rescue ops on
content: Around 400 students and staff at Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalaya in Gurdaspur were stranded due to severe flooding, submerging the school's ground floor. NDRF and army teams were deployed for rescue operations as rivers in Punjab's border districts overflowed due to dam water release, impacting several districts.

title: CWG 2030: Cabinet approves India's bid; Ahmedabad as host city
content: India's Union Cabinet, under Prime Minister Modi, has approved a bid to host the 2030 Commonwealth Games in Ahmedabad. This decision includes signing a Host Collaboration Agreement and providing financial support to Gujarat. The Games, featuring 72 nations, aim to boost tourism, create jobs, and inspire young athletes, utilising facilities like the Narendra Modi Stadium.

title: Chhattisgarh shocker: Man butchers mother; sits near body singing
content: In a shocking incident in Chhattisgarh's Jashpur district, Jeet Ram Yadav brutally murdered his mother with an axe, leaving her body unrecognizable. He then sat near the corpse, singing and threatening anyone who approached. Police faced a four-hour standoff before finally overpowering and arresting Yadav, who appears to be mentally unstable.

title: Asia Cup: Big update on Shubman Gill and Hardik Pandya - details inside
content: India’s T20I vice-captain Shubman Gill has recovered from a viral flu and will undergo training at the BCCI Centre of Excellence in Bengaluru this week. While Gill missed the Duleep Trophy opener, several top cricketers including Kuldeep Yadav, Arshdeep Singh, and Hardik Pandya are also at the CoE for fitness work.

title: Musk reacts to Swift’s engagement to Travis Kelce; offers to father her child
content: Pop culture is buzzing over Taylor Swift's engagement to Travis Kelce, announced with a simple garden photo. Elon Musk reacted with a rocket emoji, referencing SpaceX. Donald Trump offered his well wishes to the couple, praising both Swift and Kelce. As Kelce gears up for the NFL season, wedding plans remain unclear, potentially coinciding with his playoff preparations.

title: Himachal flood fury: Truck disappears in seconds in raging Beas river - watch
content: A pickup truck was swept away by the Beas river in Manali after the road collapsed due to heavy monsoon rains. The IMD has issued a 'red' alert for several districts, forecasting extremely heavy rainfall in the next 48 hours. Connectivity between Mandi and Kullu is severely disrupted due to landslides, and authorities are urging people to avoid unnecessary travel.

title: Bihar polls: Nitish govt minister hounded by mob; chased for 1km, car attacked
content: In Bihar's Nalanda district, Rural Development Minister Shrawan Kumar and JD(U) legislator Krishna Murari Sharan faced villagers' wrath following a road accident that killed nine. Villagers, demanding immediate compensation, chased the minister and MLA for a kilometre after the minister's delayed response. The minister switched vehicles multiple times to escape the angry mob, resulting in injuries to a security officer.

title: 'Deep hatred': Did Rahul Gandhi insult Ambedkar during Bihar rally? Watch video
content: BJP accused Rahul Gandhi and Tejashwi Yadav of disrespecting BR Ambedkar during their 'Voter Adhikar Yatra' in Bihar. Amit Malviya shared a video showing Gandhi's bodyguards pushing away a man with Ambedkar's photo. This follows accusations against Lalu Yadav for allegedly disrespecting Ambedkar's portrait.

title: Taylor Swift – Travis Kelce engagement: Old childhood photo of the couple goes viral
content: Pop sensation Taylor Swift and NFL star Travis Kelce announced their engagement on Tuesday, captivating fans worldwide. The couple shared the news with a playful Instagram post, referencing their 'English teacher' and 'gym teacher' personas. Their two-year romance, a blend of music and sports, has seen Swift cheering at Kelce's games and Kelce supporting her Eras Tour.

title: Sonic trolls Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce’s ring with a hilarious comparison
content: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce's engagement sparked widespread attention, but Sonic the Hedgehog's witty response stole the show. The official Sonic account playfully compared Swift's diamond ring to a Chaos Emerald, a rare gem from the game's universe. This clever crossover quickly went viral, showcasing the power of cultural timing and humor in marketing.

title: 'Gujarat model is of vote-chori': Rahul Gandhi targets PM Modi, ECI in Bihar rally
content: Rahul Gandhi intensified his criticism of Narendra Modi and the Election Commission, branding the "Gujarat Model" as a scheme for electoral fraud. He alleged that Modi's victories relied on manipulating votes with the ECI's assistance.

title: From Michael Clarke to Yuvraj Singh: Cricketers who battled cancer with courage
content: Cricketers, including Michael Clarke, Richie Benaud, and Yuvraj Singh, have faced cancer battles, highlighting the disease's impact across generations. Clarke recently underwent his sixth skin cancer surgery, urging fans to take preventive measures.

title: Stalin in Bihar: BJP shares compilation of anti-Bihari remarks by DMK leaders
content: Tamil Nadu Chief Minister M.K. Stalin's Bihar visit for Rahul Gandhi's Voter Adhikar Yatra has sparked controversy. BJP leader K. Annamalai released videos of DMK leaders' alleged derogatory comments about Bihar residents. Annamalai challenged Stalin to repeat those remarks while sharing the stage with Gandhi, intensifying political tensions.

title: Former CBFC chief takes a dig at Vivek Oberoi, reacting to 'Company' actor's comment
content: Pahlaj Nihalani, the former CBFC chief, revisits the 'Udta Punjab' censorship debate, asserting that the film's language was passed with necessary cuts. He criticizes Prasoon Joshi's absence from the CBFC and highlights the rise of streaming platforms post his tenure.

title: Noida 'dowry death': How did Nikki die? Police to quiz sister Kanchan again
content: Noida police are re-examining Nikki Bhati's sister, Kanchan, amid conflicting claims surrounding Nikki's death. New CCTV footage and a video purportedly recorded by Kanchan have surfaced, prompting investigators to verify statements and establish the sequence of events. Nikki's family alleges dowry harassment, while Vipin's family claims a cylinder blast caused the fatal burns.

title: Exclusive | Gifted airgun yields India gold medal: 41-year-old IPS now targets Olympics
content: IPS officer Ingit Pratap Singh clinched a gold medal in the 10-metre air rifle event at the World Police and Fire Games, fulfilling a childhood dream nurtured by his father's early encouragement. Despite setbacks in his initial army aspirations, Singh's passion for serving the country led him to the IPS.

title: ‘Bad for Russia’: Trump warns of ‘economic war’ if Putin rejects Ukraine talks
content: US President Donald Trump has warned Russia of a potential "economic war" if Putin and Zelenskiy fail to resolve the Ukraine conflict. Despite a Trump-Putin summit and facilitated dialogues, no concrete meeting arrangements have materialized.

title: Was aiming for Hamas camera placed at Gaza hospital: Israel defends double strike
content: Following the Gaza hospital strike that resulted in numerous fatalities, including journalists, the Israeli military released initial findings, stating troops targeted a Hamas-operated camera near Nasser Hospital. The IDF claims the camera was used to monitor Israeli movements and direct attacks, citing Hamas's past use of hospitals for military purposes.

title: SpaceX’s Starship releases first batch of mock satellites in orbit
content: SpaceX's Starship achieved a significant milestone by successfully deploying mock Starlink satellites using its innovative "Pez" dispenser system. This tenth test flight demonstrated the potential for mass satellite deployment, crucial for expanding the Starlink constellation. The mission also validated new heat shield tiles, bringing Starship closer to operational readiness and its future role in both satellite internet and lunar missions.

title: 50+ burn marks on body: MP bride branded by husband for 'not being beautiful'
content: In a shocking incident in Barwani district, a man branded his wife with a hot knife, accusing her of not being beautiful. Khushboo, the victim, reported the abuse to the police, revealing over 50 burn marks on her body. Her husband, Dilip Pipaliya, has been booked for causing hurt and cruelty.

title: 'MEGA has become MAHA headache for India': Congress slams PM Modi on Trump's tariffs
content: Congress criticized the government as US tariffs took effect, stating PM Modi's 'MAGA+MIGA=MEGA' formula has become a 'MAHA headache' for India. Jairam Ramesh expressed concern over the 'Trump double tariff' impacting India's exports and the growing strictness on H1B visas. He mocked Modi's 'Make India Great Again' vision, inspired by Trump's slogan.

title: 'On and off field'! Cheteshwar Pujara responds to Virat Kohli's 'job' comment
content: Virat Kohli expressed his gratitude to Cheteshwar Pujara for his invaluable contribution to the Indian Test team's middle order, acknowledging how Pujara's presence at number 3 made his own role at number 4 easier. The duo shared a strong partnership, amassing 3,513 runs together.

title: Rampage Jackson goes live and addresses his son Raja Jackson’s assault on wrestler
content: Quinton "Rampage" Jackson addressed the controversy surrounding his son, Raja, and an alleged assault involving professional wrestler Syko Stu, during a recent livestream. While expressing sympathy for Stu and his family, Jackson emphasized his role as a father, and said that he must support his son during this difficult time.

title: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce engaged: Celebrities send couple their love
content: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce announced their engagement on August 26 via a joint Instagram post, sparking widespread celebration. The news, accompanied by photos of the proposal, drew congratulations from celebrities, athletes, and political figures, including Donald Trump. Patrick Mahomes and his wife Brittany also shared their excitement.

title: Trump to chair 'large meeting' on Gaza’s future today
content: The Trump administration is set to unveil a "comprehensive plan" for Gaza's post-war management, marking a shift from previous deference to Arab allies. Special envoy Steve Witkoff emphasised Trump's humanitarian motives and opposition to partial hostage deals, advocating for the complete dismantling of Hamas before further negotiations.

title: 'Not his style to negotiate over phone': PM Modi avoided four Trump calls, says report
content: Amid escalating trade tensions, Prime Minister Narendra Modi reportedly declined multiple calls from US President Donald Trump, signaling a strain in relations. This comes as Trump claimed to have averted a nuclear war between India and Pakistan, a claim widely disputed.

title: Quinn Hughes, Cale Makar lead defenseman ratings in NHL 26
content: Quinn Hughes of the Vancouver Canucks has been crowned the most stalwart defender with 95 OVR . the american is among the top five highest-rated athletes in the entire game . Zach Werenski , Roman Josi , Victor Hedman , and Rasmus Dahlin are chasing the top 20 .

title: Madden NFL 26 Team Captains program honors leaders from the 2010s
content: Madden NFL 26 is available to play . players can be upgraded to 83 OVR, becoming strong members of any squad . team Captains' maximum OVR cap will be raised throughout the game's lifecycle . the promo pays tribute to successful team leaders from the 2010s .

title: Why Jayden Daniels and Drake Maye will beat player futures projections
content: the 2025 season is just around the corner, so it's time to look at the odds . our analysts did just that, scouring the odds trying to find numbers that stood out . despite constant pressure, the Washington Commanders QB completed 69% of his passes for 3,568 yards .

title: News: Rangers lose Eovaldi; Alvarez returns for Houston
content: fantasy baseball buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around MLB . new york Yankees host the Washington Nationals in an interleague tilt . willson Contreras has appealed his six-game suspension .

title: How Kalen DeBoer looks to make things right in Year 2 at Alabama
content: "it was basically the elephant in the room," says a team meeting . "if you don't want to be here, leave," says the team's head strength coach . a meeting in which coach David Ballou spared nobody in an earsplitting tirade .

title: Draft Guide: Rankings, mock drafts and analysis
content: this draft guide will serve as a one-stop shop for all of our best material . we have everything needed to help you draft a great team . create a league and customize league size, scoring and rules to play in the league you want .

title: Four picks to win your finals
content: injuries are influencing rotations around the league, such as the wave of starters missing for the Indiana Fever . it can be frustrating when the stars that helped get you this far are sidelined, but it also creates openings for hidden gems to step up . don't be afraid to take risks as short-term production matters more than name value .

content: Iga Swiatek beats Emiliana Arango 6-1, 6-2 in straight sets to move on to the second round . the no. 2 seed will play suzan Lamens of the Netherlands on Thursday . she has won 16 of her last 17 matches, a run that includes her first title .

title: Catch up on NFL cuts, trades and final roster moves
content:
C.J. Stroud joins "First Take" to discuss how the Texans' offensive line has improved as a unit to protect him better in the 2025 NFL season. (1:13) The roster  cut-down deadline  for all  32 teams  for the  2025 NFL season  has passed. Each front office had to trim its active roster to 53 players by 4 p.m. ET, which means there were plenty of cuts, trades, practice squad additions and  roster moves  announced. Good news: We tracked it all for you. Here is the intel, including notable moves and what our reporters heard. There will be no more updates. Quick links: 
 Team-by-team list of cuts 
 Depth charts  |  Trade tracker  |  Trade grades 
 Fantasy football draft guide  |  Sign up to play
